org.middleheaven.quantity.math.structure
Interface GroupAdditive<A>

All Known Subinterfaces:
Amount<T,E>, Field<F>, Ring<T>, Scalable<E,T>, VectorSpace<V,F>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AngularMeasure, BigDecimalReal, BigInt, Complex, DecimalMeasure, LongInteger, Matrix, Money, Numeral, Real, RealPairComplex, SingleValueVectorDiagonalMatrix, Vector
public interface GroupAdditive<A>

Method Summary
 A minus(A other)
          Returns the sum of this object with the additive inverse of the one specified.
 A negate()
          Returns the additive inverse of this object.
 A plus(A other)
          Returns the sum of this object with the one specified.
 A zero()
          ZERO is the group neutral element defined as this.plus(this.negate)
